actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate a fund source for the acquisition and maintenance of concession facilities in the National Park System.

summary.text: Establishes in the Treasury a separate account for the acquisition and maintenance of concession facilities in the national park system.

titles.title: A bill to designate a fund source for the acquisition and maintenance of concession facilities in the National Park System.
